subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: MArty Turco made 38 saves and Joel Lundqvist scored the winning goal in the second period Saturday for the Dallas Stars, who defeated the Detroit Red Wings, 2-1.
snippet: MArty Turco made 38 saves and Joel Lundqvist scored the winning goal in the second period Saturday for the Dallas Stars, who defeated the Detroit Red Wings, 2-1.
